main event: Multiple unidentified objects were observed over Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada on March 20, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 15 to 20 minutes., The objects were observed visually., The course of the objects was towards the west-northwest., No photographs were taken during the sighting., The report was part of the Project Blue Book program investigating UFOs.
sighted object: multiple unidentified objects in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. C Gillis of Doctors Cove, Nova Scotia
